item.title: Microsoft Releases Urgent Fix for Sharepoint Vulnerability Being Used in Global Cyberattacks
item.description: Hackers have taken advantage of zero-day exploit to carry out widespread attacks.

item.title: I Sacrificed For A Partner’s Business And Might Get Nothing
item.description: … and two other tricky workplace dilemmas.

item.title: A Brand-New Study Says Exercise Can Significantly Boost Your Mood and Mental Health– But With 1 ‘Meaningful’ Catch
item.description: Exercise is good for your body. But if also want exercise to improve your mood, and help you feel better about yourself, the context matters.

item.title: How the Fed Unintentionally Broke Small Business Lending–And What You Can Do About It
item.description: It’s not your imagination–borrowing has become harder. Here’s what happened and how you can overcome it.

item.title: A Top Fed Official Is Ready to Dissent Against Jerome Powell
item.description: Fed Governor Christopher Waller wants to cut interest rates immediately.
